page.title: 01Exmouth: Our Town.
page.content: {Exmouth}is a town in{East Devon.}It has a population of about{33,000.} There are 8 primary schools here. There are 100 children from two schools, Marpool Primary and Brixington Junior, involved in the Domesday Project. We are sharing a 4X3sq.km block. We think that life in Exmouth is a lot of fun. In the summer when it is hot we can go to the beach to sun-bathe or swim in the pool. In the evenings there are several clubs which we can go to, four of which are {Brownies, Cubs, Boys Brigade}and {Y.M.C.A.} During the summer Exmouth is a busy holiday resort. Although there are not many places to pitch a tent, there are quite a few hotels and a large caravan site called{Sandy Bay}4 km from our schools.
